Text:
This is my first torrent so be nice
Quality is Great
This is the original story that the American Movie has Enjoybeen based on.

Not a DVDR image, moved to Movies.


In the future, when you create a torrent with an AVI file in it, do NOT change the file type from .AVI to .Horror.
There are no applications that can open a .Horror file.
Downloaders of this torrent will need to change the file type back to .AVI before they will be able to play the movie file.
